text: Kaarle Pekkala (4 October 1919 - 18 June 2000) was a Finnish sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre pistol event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2000 deaths Category:Finnish male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Finland Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Vyborg
title: Kaarle Pekkala
